prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing thank-you greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

üé® CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clich√© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "Thank you for being such a good listener, your care and love make my heart dance. Thank you for calling"
Style: üé® Watercolor
Tone: ‚ù§Ô∏è Heartfelt - sincere and emotional
To: Burrin
From: Ae
Message: "My dearest Burrin,
Hearing your voice on the phone was exactly what my heart needed. Thank you for always listening so deeply and making me feel so incredibly loved and understood. You truly make my world brighter.

All my love,
Ae"



CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front ‚Üí interior ‚Üí back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the sincere and emotional tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way








Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "thank-you" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. Create charming cartoon-style or stylized illustrated figures if people are needed for the theme. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a thank-you card with sincere and emotional tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "My dearest Burrin,
Hearing your voice on the phone was exactly what my heart needed. Thank you for always listening so deeply and making me feel so incredibly loved and understood. You truly make my world brighter.

All my love,
Ae" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clich√© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
Here are the detailed prompts for each section of the greeting card, designed to create a cohesive and heartwarming visual narrative in a watercolor style:

```json
{
  "frontCover": "Front cover of a greeting card with a 9:16 aspect ratio. The scene is set against a deep, starry night sky with subtle watercolor gradients of indigo, deep blue, and hints of purple at the bottom. A stylized, crescent moon, painted in warm, glowing yellow with soft watercolor textures, arches across the upper portion of the card. Perched on the moon is a charming, stylized illustration of a young girl with short brown hair and closed eyes, a gentle smile on her face, and a rosy blush on her cheeks. She is holding an old-fashioned blue telephone to her ear. Emanating from the phone towards the girl's head are musical notes and small hearts in soft shades of pink, orange, and yellow, rendered with delicate watercolor strokes and a subtle glow. The overall mood is peaceful and joyful. The text \"Thank you\" is written in the lower center of the card in a beautiful, flowing, handwritten cursive script with a creamy off-white color. The script is elegant and legible, with a natural, warm feel. The background has a textured paper effect with visible watercolor brushstrokes and organic paint bleeds. The artistic style is a soft, whimsical watercolor illustration, capturing a heartfelt and emotional tone.",
  "backCover": "Back cover of a greeting card with a 9:16 aspect ratio. The background features a continuation of the starry night sky from the front cover, with deep blues and purples, but more muted and serene. A few faint, scattered stars and subtle watercolor textures are present. In the center-left of the card, there is a delicate watercolor rendering of a single, stylized musical note, perhaps in a soft peach or light pink hue, with a very faint, ethereal glow. This element subtly references the musical notes from the front cover, providing a gentle, artistic closure. The overall composition is minimalist and peaceful, with no text or figures. The bottom-right corner area of approximately 1 inch square is left completely clear and undecorated for a QR code. The artistic style is consistent with the front cover, featuring soft watercolor brushstrokes and paper texture.",
  "leftInterior": "Left interior of a greeting card with a 9:16 aspect ratio. The background is a soft wash of watercolor in warm purples and pinks at the top, transitioning to a gentle indigo and deep blue towards the bottom, creating a celestial feel. Across the center of the page, a whimsical, stylized watercolor illustration depicts wisps of soft, glowing light and abstract shapes that evoke the feeling of harmonious sound or a gentle, comforting presence. This could manifest as swirling, delicate lines of watercolor paint in soft golden and blush tones, interspersed with tiny, diffused star-like sparkles. The visual elements are abstract and evocative, conveying a sense of warmth, understanding, and emotional connection without depicting any specific objects or figures. The overall mood is serene, warm, and deeply emotional, aligning with the heartfelt tone of the card. The artistic style is purely abstract watercolor with soft, flowing colors and organic paint bleeds, creating a dreamy and intimate atmosphere.",
  "rightInterior": "Right interior of a greeting card with a 9:16 aspect ratio. The background mirrors the soft celestial hues of the left interior, with transitions from warm purples and pinks at the top to deep blues and indigos at the bottom, maintaining a consistent starry night atmosphere. Integrated into the watercolor background, artistically framing the message, are delicate watercolor illustrations of abstract, luminous shapes and faint, swirling lines in soft gold and blush tones. These elements subtly echo the musical notes and hearts from the front cover, suggesting a flow of positive energy and affection. The message \"My dearest Burrin,\nHearing your voice on the phone was exactly what my heart needed. Thank you for always listening so deeply and making me feel so incredibly loved and understood. You truly make my world brighter.\n\nAll my love,\nAe\" is written in the center of the card in a beautiful, clear, handwritten cursive script. The handwriting is elegant, flowing, and personal, with a warm, creamy off-white ink that has a natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight, reminiscent of sophisticated calligraphy that is still approachable and heartfelt. The overall composition is designed to be visually harmonious and emotionally resonant, conveying a sincere and loving message within a beautiful, artistic context. The artistic style is consistent with soft, expressive watercolor painting with visible brushstrokes and paper texture."
}
```
generatedPrompts.backCover:
Back cover design for a heartfelt watercolor greeting card, featuring a deep, textured indigo-purple background that fades slightly lighter towards the bottom. A single, delicate, gently curving line in a pale, luminous gold or soft peach color originates from the lower left quadrant and ascends towards the upper left, subtly echoing the movement of the front cover's heart-shaped balloon string. The line is minimalistic and organic, with subtle watercolor-like variations in thickness and opacity, creating a sense of gentle movement and quietude. There is no text or explicit imagery, but the overall composition provides a serene and understated conclusion to the visual narrative, leaving ample space, particularly in the lower right corner, clear for a QR code. The artistic style is consistent with the front cover, maintaining a soft, textured watercolor effect with subtle variations in color saturation and brushwork, evoking a mood of peaceful reflection.

generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a thank you greeting card with a vintage dark purple telephone handset on the left, emitting a vibrant, abstract rainbow of watercolor washes that flow to the right. These washes transition from deep pinks and reds near the handset, through oranges and yellows, to aqua and teal further to the right. Emerging from these watercolor streams are delicate, stylized lotus flowers in soft pink, teal, and a warm golden orange, each rendered with ethereal watercolor textures and gentle paint bleeds. The background is a textured, creamy off-white, with subtle speckles of watercolor in warm tones suggesting a soft, glowing atmosphere. The overall style is a heartfelt watercolor painting with soft, flowing colors, visible artistic brush strokes, and an organic feel, emphasizing the emotional connection of a meaningful phone call.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior:
Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with a vibrant, abstract watercolor design on the left and ample white space for text on the right. The watercolor artwork features a dynamic burst of colors including fuchsia, pink, bright yellow, and turquoise, bleeding into each other with soft, organic edges. The watercolor strokes are visible, creating a textured, painterly effect. Within this colorful abstract art, delicate, radiating brushstrokes in lighter shades of yellow and white emerge, resembling stylized bursts or sun rays, particularly along the top edge and intermingled with the bolder colors. The text is positioned to the right, set against the clean white background. The message is written in an elegant, flowing cursive script that appears handwritten with a dark ink, exhibiting natural variations in line weight and a slightly imperfect, warm character. The text itself is the primary focal point of the right side, with the watercolor art serving as a vibrant, eye-catching backdrop that frames the message without overwhelming it. The overall composition is balanced, allowing the emotional message to be easily read while being visually supported by the artistic expression.

Style: watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds, 9:16 aspect ratio.
